history.proof: intros a b. split. - intros H. sfirstorder use: Rlt_Rminus, Rminus_diag_eq unfold: Rle. - intros H. hfcrush use: Rplus_0_l, Rle_minus_r.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros a b. split. - intros H. apply Rle_minus_r in H. apply Rle_div_l with (c := 1). lra. apply H. - intros H. apply Rle_div_r with (c := 1). lra. apply H.
